title: AI Associate
summary: Aspiring AI Associate with a strong foundation in computer science and proven experience in developing and deploying machine learning models. Proficient in Python and familiar with key ML frameworks like TensorFlow and PyTorch. Eager to collaborate with cross-functional teams to deliver innovative AI solutions and contribute to the continuous improvement of AI/ML capabilities. Seeking to apply analytical thinking and problem-solving skills to real-world AI challenges.

experience.title: Freelance Software Engineer
description: Designed and developed responsive web applications using React.js and Tailwind CSS, focusing on user-centric design principles.
Built and deployed AI applications tailored to client requirements, including sentiment analysis tools utilizing Python and machine learning libraries.
Developed facial recognition systems utilizing OpenCV and Mediapipe, integrating them into real-time monitoring tools.
Implemented real-time monitoring tools using data science principles, demonstrating problem-solving skills and analytical thinking.
Collaborated closely with clients throughout the development lifecycle to ensure solutions aligned with their needs and expectations, showcasing strong communication skills.

experience.title: Student Teacher
description: Collaborated with a team to deliver basic science education to students in Pune schools as part of the "Project Chote Scientist" program.
Demonstrated the practical applications of science in everyday life, fostering engagement and understanding among students.
Contributed to a productive learning environment for 10-15 students from Fergusson College, developing teamwork and communication skills.
